markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 1"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Deity's Domain](/Feats.aspx?ID=214) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Champion" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=24" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 109 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

</column>

---

You embody an aspect of your deity. Choose one of your [deity's domains](/domains). You gain the domain's initial domain spell as a devotion spell.

<title level="2">Deity's Domain leads to...</title>
[Advanced Deity's Domain](/Feats.aspx?ID=231)
name: Deity's Domain
